title: Provides that insurance policies that cover annual physicals and well care visits shall allow one visit per calendar year
summary: Provides that insurance policies that cover annual physicals and well care visits shall allow one visit per calendar year.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          397

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. GUNTHER, GOTTFRIED -- Multi-Sponsored by -- M. of
         A. MONTESANO -- read once and referred to the Committee on Insurance

       AN  ACT  to amend the insurance law, in relation to annual physicals and
         well care visits

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Subsection  (i)  of  section 3216 of the insurance law is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph 28 to read as follows:
    3    (28) EVERY INDIVIDUAL POLICY WHICH PROVIDES MEDICAL, MAJOR MEDICAL  OR
    4  SIMILAR  COMPREHENSIVE-TYPE  COVERAGE THAT INCLUDES COVERAGE FOR A PHYS-
    5  ICAL OR WELL CARE VISIT ONCE IN  EVERY  THREE  HUNDRED  SIXTY-FIVE  DAYS
    6  SHALL  BE  INTERPRETED TO MEAN THAT SUCH PHYSICAL OR WELL CARE VISIT CAN
    7  BE HAD ONCE EVERY CALENDAR YEAR, REGARDLESS OF WHETHER OR NOT  A  PERIOD
    8  OF  THREE HUNDRED SIXTY-FIVE DAYS HAS PASSED SINCE THE PREVIOUS PHYSICAL
    9  OR WELL CARE VISIT.
   10    S 2. Subsection (k) of section 3221 of the insurance law is amended by
   11  adding a new paragraph 17 to read as follows:
   12    (17) EVERY GROUP OR  BLANKET  POLICY  WHICH  PROVIDES  MEDICAL,  MAJOR
   13  MEDICAL  OR  SIMILAR  COMPREHENSIVE-TYPE COVERAGE THAT INCLUDES COVERAGE
   14  FOR A PHYSICAL OR WELL CARE VISIT ONCE IN EVERY THREE HUNDRED SIXTY-FIVE
   15  DAYS SHALL BE INTERPRETED TO MEAN THAT SUCH PHYSICAL OR WELL CARE  VISIT
   16  CAN  BE  HAD  ONCE  EVERY  CALENDAR YEAR, REGARDLESS OF WHETHER OR NOT A
   17  PERIOD OF THREE HUNDRED SIXTY-FIVE DAYS HAS PASSED  SINCE  THE  PREVIOUS
   18  PHYSICAL OR WELL CARE VISIT.
   19    S  3.  Section  4303  of  the insurance law is amended by adding a new
   20  subsection (hh) to read as follows:
   21    (HH) EVERY CONTRACT ISSUED BY A CORPORATION SUBJECT TO THE  PROVISIONS
   22  OF THIS ARTICLE WHICH PROVIDES MEDICAL, MAJOR MEDICAL OR SIMILAR COMPRE-
   23  HENSIVE-TYPE COVERAGE THAT INCLUDES COVERAGE FOR A PHYSICAL OR WELL CARE
   24  VISIT  ONCE  IN EVERY THREE HUNDRED SIXTY-FIVE DAYS SHALL BE INTERPRETED

        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD02189-01-1

       A. 397                              2

    1  TO MEAN THAT SUCH PHYSICAL OR WELL CARE VISIT  CAN  BE  HAD  ONCE  EVERY
    2  CALENDAR  YEAR,  REGARDLESS  OF WHETHER OR NOT A PERIOD OF THREE HUNDRED
    3  SIXTY-FIVE DAYS HAS PASSED SINCE THE  PREVIOUS  PHYSICAL  OR  WELL  CARE
    4  VISIT.
    5    S  4.  This  act shall take effect on the ninetieth day after it shall
    6  have become a law and shall apply  to  policies  and  contracts  issued,
    7  renewed, modified, altered or amended on or after such date.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to annual physicals and well care visits
